price: 108. "Wherein they shall dwell (forever). No desire will they have for removal therefrom."
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
